en: Religious leaders questioned Jesus about ritual washing.
He responded by speaking about what truly defiles a person.

lines: The Pharisees and some teachers of the law
saw that some of his disciples ate food
with hands that were ceremonially unwashed.
They asked Jesus,
“Why do your disciples not live according
to the tradition of the elders?”
Jesus called the crowd to him and said,
“Listen to me, everyone, and understand this.
Nothing outside a person
can make them unclean by going into them.
Rather, it is what comes out of a person
that makes them unclean.”
For from within,
out of the heart,
come evil thoughts,
sexual immorality, theft, murder, adultery,
greed, malice, deceit,
envy, slander, arrogance and folly.
All these evils come from inside
and make a person unclean.

question.en: What does Jesus say is the true source of moral uncleanness?
